mapper.select: SELECT * FROM text_video WHERE CONCAT(IFNULL(`title`,''),IFNULL(`author`,''),IFNULL(`digest`,''),IFNULL(`text`,''),IFNULL(`create_time`,''),IFNULL(`upload_time`,''),IFNULL(`unit`,''),IFNULL(`part`,''),IFNULL(`page`,''),IFNULL(`update_time`,''))IFNULL(`remark`,'')) LIKE '%#{keyWord}%' limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM text_video WHERE CONCAT(IFNULL(`title`,''),IFNULL(`author`,''),IFNULL(`digest`,''),IFNULL(`text`,''),IFNULL(`create_time`,''),IFNULL(`upload_time`,''),IFNULL(`unit`,''),IFNULL(`part`,''),IFNULL(`page`,''),IFNULL(`update_time`,''))IFNULL(`remark`,'')) LIKE '%#{keyWord}%'
